bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.description: Wrapper layers like LastTimeStep and FrozenLayer aren't Recurrent layers, so they can't return the previous state in the current implementation - even though it exists and we could return it... <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/blob/ce5f648509f3cafe0ef1dc065755d9481db420a2/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j-nn/src/main/java/org/deeplearning4j/nn/graph/ComputationGraph.java#L3445-L3450>https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/blob/ce5f648509f3cafe0ef1dc065755d9481db420a2/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j-nn/src/main/java/org/deeplearning4j/nn/graph/ComputationGraph.java#L3445-L3450</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
